Title: Kim Kardashian Denounces Fabricated Reports on Kanye West's Cosmetics Line
In today's era of misleading information and sensationalism, it is imperative to separate fact from fiction. In a recent turn of events, an unsubstantiated report has emerged, claiming that Kim Kardashian, the renowned reality TV star and businesswoman, is distressed by her husband's venture into the cosmetics industry. However, after careful investigation, Gossip Cop can exclusively expose this report as nothing more than a fabrication.
The alleged rumors surrounding Kanye West's foray into the cosmetics world took social media platforms by storm, igniting a wave of speculation and discussions. Citing unnamed sources, this seemingly baseless report suggested that Kim Kardashian was particularly unhappy with her husband's latest entrepreneurial endeavor. Nevertheless, it is essential to approach such narratives with skepticism and employ thorough research to ascertain the truth.
As a trusted source committed to debunking celebrity falsehoods, Gossip Cop has conducted an extensive inquiry into this matter. Multiple reliable insiders have categorically denied any truth to the claims that there exists a rift within the Kardashian-West household over Kanye West's involvement in the cosmetics industry.
Kim Kardashian, a highly accomplished entrepreneur herself, has consistently shown unwavering support for her husband's various endeavors. Their relationship has undoubtedly proven to be a testament to their united drive for success and shared pursuit of interesting business ventures.
Despite the media frenzy surrounding these alleged concerns, it is essential to decipher fact from sensationalism. Gossip Cop's exhaustive investigation has affirmed that Kim Kardashian remains fully supportive of Kanye West's endeavors, including his venture into the cosmetics realm.
Celebrity falsehoods have the potential to spread like wildfire, often distorting the public's perception, and portraying an inaccurate reality. Therefore, it is crucial to rely on trustworthy sources that discern truth from fabrication. With Gossip Cop's unwavering commitment to debunking baseless claims, we can confidently conclude that Kim Kardashian's supposed discontent over Kanye West's cosmetic line is a mere work of fiction.
As consumers and admirers of true journalism, it is our responsibility to question the validity of the information presented to us. The story surrounding Kim Kardashian and Kanye West's unyielding partnership, combined with their extraordinary entrepreneurial spirit, serves as a source of inspiration, rather than the breaking point falsely depicted by misguided reports.
In the era of rampant misinformation, it is Gossip Cop's exclusive duty to cut through the noise, separating fact from fiction. Today, we stand united in asserting the unfounded nature of the claims made against Kim Kardashian and her support for Kanye West's cosmetics line. It is our hope that this clarification will serve as a reminder to exercise discernment and seek reliable sources when consuming celebrity news.

London (CNN) Britain's Prince Harry and American actor Meghan Markle will marry on May 19, 2018, Kensington Palace announced Friday.  The pair, who will get married in St. George's Chapel at Windsor Castle, announced their engagement in November.  On that occasion, Harry told reporters that he knew Markle was "the one" from "the very first time we met."  Prince Harry and Meghan Markle announce their engagement to the press.  The couple attended their first royal event together in the city of Nottingham earlier this month, where they were met by well-wishers.  On Wednesday it was revealed that they will spend their first Christmas as an engaged couple with Queen Elizabeth and other members of Britain's royal family at the Sandringham royal estate. The Federal Communications Commission (FCC) has made the decision to refrain from taking any official action against the highly controversial broadcast of Stephen Colbert's "The Late Show" on May 1st. During this particular episode, Colbert unleashed a series of increasingly vulgar insults aimed at President Donald Trump, in direct response to the derogatory remarks Trump had made earlier that day regarding CBS News anchor, John Dickerson.
The FCC, responsible for monitoring and regulating broadcast content, has pondered the potential consequences of Colbert's on-air onslaught, meticulously reviewing the segment in question. After profound deliberation, the commission concluded that despite the coarse nature of Colbert's verbiage, no punitive action is warranted due to the First Amendment's protection of free speech rights.
Colbert's caustic monologue has stirred heated debates across the nation, with many scrutinizing the limits of freedom of speech and the role of public figures in maintaining decorum. The incident has reignited discussions on civility and proper conduct among media personalities, further deepening the divide already present in contemporary political discourse.
While the FCC acknowledges the polarizing nature of Colbert's remarks, it has chosen to prioritize constitutional principles over disciplinary measures. The commission recognizes that regulating and censoring the content broadcasted on national television should be approached with utmost care, protecting the democratic values of a society that thrives on the open exchange of ideas. It is aware that any attempt to suppress speech, even under the scrutiny of incivility, may inadvertently create a slippery slope threatening the very foundations of free expression.
However, public outcry and political opponents continue to condemn Colbert's derogatory comments, claiming that they represent an alarming degradation of public discourse and set an undesirable precedent for future discourse. Trump's supporters, in particular, have expressed disappointment in Colbert's choice of words, asserting that such behavior is unbecoming of a public figure entrusted with the responsibility of setting an example for the nation.
In response to the FCC's decision, Colbert's critics have called for enhanced media accountability and heightened self-regulation of the industry. Advocates argue that it is crucial for media professionals to recognize the power they wield and use it responsibly in a bid to foster a more constructive environment for political dialogue.
Amidst the controversy, the incident serves as a stark reminder of the profound divisions within the United States, reflecting a nation grappling with the spirit of its own free speech protections. The FCC's verdict, while neither entirely satisfying nor universally embraced, underscores that the boundaries of political discourse in the digital age are continually evolving, necessitating a thoughtful reevaluation of societal norms and expectations governing media conduct.

Kourtney Kardashian and Scott Disick have decided to reconcile their relationship after breaking up in July 2015. The couple, who are the parents of Mason, Penelope, and Reign, were together for nine years. Despite their separation, they were frequently spotted together at family events with their children and the Kardashian family. Disick's excessive partying and pictures of him with another woman were said to be the reasons for their initial split. However, Kardashian never completely ruled out the possibility of reuniting with him, stating on "The Ellen DeGeneres Show" that he will always be a part of her family.

Kim Kardashian participated in an in-depth interview with Ellen DeGeneres on Monday, April 30th. The conversation covered various subjects, including Tristan Thompson's dishonesty and infidelity, which Kardashian described as deeply troubling. Although she expressed her regret for using explicit language on air, she emphasized that the term "f-cked up" accurately captured the gravity of the situation. When directly asked about her opinion of Thompson, Kardashian did not provide a straightforward response. Instead, she discussed how her sister Khloe tends to plunge into relationships and emphasized the family's unwavering support. This aspect of the interview is indeed intriguing. Moreover, Kardashian revealed that she initially considered naming her third child Jo or Grace, and shared that Kanye played the game Connect 4 during the birth of their daughter Chicago, who was delivered via surrogate. Witnessing the birth, Kardashian expressed that any concerns or doubts she had regarding the connection with her child instantaneously vanished, and she described the experience as truly fulfilling. She further indicated that her son Saint possesses an extraordinary vocabulary and may possess exceptional intellect. In addition, she mentioned that her daughter North has been more fond of her younger sister Chicago than she initially was of Saint when he was born. Despite occasional photographic evidence suggesting otherwise, Kanye West is indeed a content individual. Regarding Kardashian's sentiments towards Thompson, both presently and even prior to this scandal, further insights can be found in the accompanying video.

Unveiling a vulnerability seldom seen in the realm of Hollywood, the distinguished performer bravely shared personal insights into the trials and triumphs of his mental health journey.
The talented actor, known for his iconic role as Edward Cullen in the Twilight series, revealed that beneath the glitz and glamour lies an individual grappling with the pressures and hardships that often accompany fame. Pattinson, who has garnered a legion of devoted fans over the years, confessed to grappling with the incessant scrutiny and heightened expectations that characterize his captivating presence in the public eye.
Amidst this profound introspection, Pattinson disclosed his ongoing involvement in therapy as a means of navigating the complexities of his life. Recognizing the importance of mental and emotional well-being, the actor showcased a commendable commitment to self-care and personal growth.
Throughout this introspective exchange, Pattinson highlighted the significance of discussing mental health openly and destigmatizing conversations surrounding it. By using his platform to amplify these crucial dialogues, the actor demonstrated an unwavering dedication to raising awareness and fostering a supportive environment for those who might be struggling.
Furthermore, the highly anticipated film Good Time emerged as a pivotal point of conversation, further underscoring the incredible range of Pattinson's talent. The critically acclaimed crime thriller, directed by Benny and Josh Safdie, showcases the actor's gripping portrayal of a man desperately chasing redemption amidst a cacophony of chaos.
Pattinson's artistic endeavor in Good Time, coupled with his courageous transparency concerning his mental health journey, serves as an inspirational testament to the resilience and tenacity of an individual grappling with life's complexities. By deftly juggling both the demands of a compelling cinematic performance and the intensely personal journey towards emotional well-being, Pattinson continues to captivate and inspire audiences worldwide.
As the interview concluded, a poignant impression lingered: Robert Pattinson's unwavering determination to explore the intricacies of the human experience, both on and off-screen. By delving into the depths of his personal struggles and utilizing his influential position to advocate for mental health, the esteemed actor exemplifies the transformative power of vulnerability, reminding us all that self-reflection and growth are indispensable elements of the human experience.

Mary J. Blige says she was hacked and was not the person who tweeted a hateful message about estranged husband, Martin “Kendu” Isaacs. Gossip Cop can help set the record straight.  On Sunday morning, a tweet appeared on Blige’s feed stating, “F*ck Kendu Isaacs I f*cking hate him and his whole family. I unfollowed him on IG & ALL of my fans need 2. #StrengthOfAWoman 4/28 #DuDeadDay.” But the missive was deleted, and Blige is now insisting she is not the person who wrote it.  “Hey guys. I was hacked with that message about Kendu. I dont hate him & his family. Nor do I wish death on him. I just want this 2 B over,” Blige said. “This,” of course, is the spouses’ unsettled divorce. As Gossip Cop reported, Blige filed for divorce from Isaacs, her husband and manager, last July. The couple split after 12 years of marriage.

Mike Walker Reports… There's a new marshal galloping toward Dodge City, and his name's Blake Shelton! In a surprising turn of events, Hollywood is abuzz with the news that the classic television series "Gunsmoke" is set to make its grand return to the silver screen. Sources close to the studio have revealed that the iconic character of Marshal Matt Dillon will be portrayed by none other than the chart-topping country musician and charismatic TV personality, Blake Shelton. The prospect of seeing these two beloved celebrities make their mark in the Western genre has already sparked widespread anticipation and excitement.
For those unfamiliar with "Gunsmoke," this legendary TV series holds a revered place in American culture. James Arness, with his masterful portrayal of Marshal Matt Dillon, brought the character to life and earned himself a place in television history. Now, the torch is set to be passed to the unlikely but undeniably talented duo of Shelton and Stefani.

Having already conquered the world of country music and reality television, Shelton's foray into acting holds tremendous potential. As for Gwen Stefani, her casting reinforces the notion that this new adaptation of "Gunsmoke" will be a fresh departure from its predecessors. Known for her dynamic stage presence and unique sense of style, Stefani's inclusion is expected to infuse the film with a touch of modernity and allure. Fans can't help but anticipate the chemistry between Shelton and Stefani and what they will bring to the beloved characters.
With Hollywood increasingly revisiting and reimagining classic television shows, the news of "Gunsmoke's" return to the big screen has breathed new life into the Western genre. Although specifics regarding the film's plot and production remain under wraps, the mere mention of Blake Shelton and Gwen Stefani's involvement has already generated a palpable sense of excitement among Western enthusiasts and fans alike.
As the project gains momentum, fans of the original series eagerly await further updates and casting announcements. The allure of a new Marshal Matt Dillon patrolling the streets of Dodge City, accompanied by the glamour and talent of Blake Shelton and Gwen Stefani, will undoubtedly draw droves of both devoted fans and curious newcomers to theaters.
The stage is set for an enthralling revival of "Gunsmoke" that promises to transport audiences back to the golden age of Western television while simultaneously infusing it with a fresh and captivating perspective.

LOS ANGELES (CBSLA) — NBA superstar Blake Griffin, known for his remarkable skills and remarkable setbacks, has been dealt another blow as he embarks on a new chapter in his career. In a shocking trade move, the injury-prone Griffin has been traded to the Detroit Pistons on Monday, raising concerns about his future and fueling speculation about a possible connection to a notorious celebrity family.
Blake Griffin's journey in professional basketball has been nothing short of captivating. His explosive dunks, remarkable athleticism, and leadership qualities have earned him respect and admiration throughout the league. However, recurring injuries have cast a cloud of uncertainty over his trajectory in recent years, leaving fans and analysts to question if he could ever reclaim his former glory.
In an unforeseen twist, the Los Angeles Clippers traded their cornerstone player to the Pistons, a decision that has sent shockwaves through the NBA community. With Detroit's acquisition of Griffin, a player who boasts formidable talent when healthy, the Pistons have expressed their belief in his ability to reignite their franchise and lead them towards a prosperous future.
Nevertheless, some have drawn a correlation between Griffin's career decline and his alleged ties to a certain celebrity family. While the accuracy and validity of these claims remain unconfirmed, there is no denying that his relationship with the public eye has been under constant scrutiny. Whether it be the alleged distractions or the burden of expectations that come with his associations, critics argue that Blake Griffin's downfall could be linked to the relentless media attention he has faced.
In light of these latest developments, it is imperative to understand that Griffin's legacy should be judged solely on his basketball prowess and undeniable talent. We must resist the temptation to indulge in speculative narratives that sensationalize his personal life and instead focus on his contributions to the sport.
As Blake Griffin begins this new chapter in his career donning a Pistons jersey, there is an undeniable sense of anticipation for what the future holds. Detroit has placed a considerable bet on Griffin's ability to stay healthy and lead their team to new heights. In return, the power forward must overcome his injury-plagued past and prove that he is still an elite player capable of dominating the court.
Only time will tell if Blake Griffin's move to Detroit will ultimately define a reinvigorated chapter in his career or solidify a decline influenced by circumstances beyond his control. As fans, we must stand united in giving Griffin the fair chance he deserves, free from the distractions and conjecture surrounding his personal life. The destiny of this talented player lies in his own hands, his resilience, and his unwavering dedication to the game that has brought him this far.

In this April 30, 2017, file photo, Beyonce and Jay Z watch during the first half in Game 7 of an NBA basketball first-round playoff series between the Los Angeles Clippers and the Utah Jazz in Los Angeles. Picture: AP  Jay-Z is focused on his family's welfare rather than building bridges with Kanye West.  The New York-born rap star and his wife Beyonce welcomed twins babies into the world in June, and Jay reportedly isn't allowing Kanye's decision to quit his streaming service Tidal to distract him from his responsibilities as a parent.  A source explained: "Jay-Z has all his attention on being a father, being a husband, and watching the success of his new album flourish.  READ: Kanye West quits Tidal over money dispute  "All Kanye is to him right now is like dealing with a pesky fly that flies into your food. It's flying around and you just want to get away from it and enjoy your meal."  One of the last pictures Jay-Z and Kanye West have taken together after the 2016 MTV VMAs. Picture: Instagram  Jay, 47, released his long-awaited '4:44' album on June 30 and he addresses their strained relationship on the record 'Kill Jay Z'.  But he isn't overly concerned by Kanye's decision to quit Tidal and is instead happy for his lawyers to resolve the situation.  The insider told HollywoodLife.com: "This latest decree or whatever it is that Kanye wants to leave Tidal will all be sorted out by lawyers.  READ: Nas hails Jay-Z's 4:44 album  "Jay will avoid all nonsense that Kanye often brings, and will not listing to his whining. Jay has more important things to worry about."  Kanye's decision to walk away from Tidal comes shortly after a source claimed that Jay and Beyonce - who also have a five-year-old daughter named Blue Ivy - "have never been happier".  Although the arrival of their twins has left the celebrity duo feeling "totally exhausted", Beyonce and Jay are both still overjoyed.  A source said: "At nights, Beyonce has been overwhelmed with all the work needed caring for two babies. Despite all the help they are receiving, Jay is still pitching it so that Beyonce has total support.  "Neither Beyonce, nor Jay, have been able to enjoy an entire night of sleep since the twins arrived. They are totally exhausted but at the same time have never been happier as a family."

During a conversation with Piers Morgan in October 2017, Cattrall made it clear that she has no intention of participating in another Sex and the City film. Furthermore, she revealed that she never truly considered herself to be friends with her co-stars from the show. When asked by Morgan if there would ever be more Sex and the City, Cattrall firmly replied, "Not for me. This decision came with the realization of turning 60, prompting me to reflect on the time I have left and what I truly desire to accomplish. I believe that the show was at its best during its original series run, and the subsequent movies were merely an added bonus."

"Jolie" redirects here. For other uses, see Jolie (disambiguation) Angelina Jolie ( joh-LEE; born Angelina Jolie Voight, June 4, 1975)[1] is an American actress, filmmaker, and humanitarian. She has received an Academy Award, two Screen Actors Guild Awards, and three Golden Globe Awards, and has been cited as Hollywood's highest-paid actress. Jolie made her screen debut as a child alongside her father, Jon Voight, in Lookin' to Get Out (1982). Her film career began in earnest a decade later with the low-budget production Cyborg 2 (1993), followed by her first leading role in a major film, Hackers (1995). She starred in the critically acclaimed biographical cable films George Wallace (1997) and Gia (1998), and won an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress for her performance in the drama Girl, Interrupted (1999). Jolie's starring role as the video game heroine Lara Croft in Lara Croft: Tomb Raider (2001) established her as a leading Hollywood actress. She continued her successful action-star career with Mr. & Mrs. Smith (2005), Wanted (2008), and Salt (2010), and received critical acclaim for her performances in the dramas A Mighty Heart (2007) and Changeling (2008), which earned her a nomination for an Academy Award for Best Actress. Her biggest commercial success came with the fantasy picture Maleficent (2014). In the 2010s, Jolie expanded her career into directing, screenwriting, and producing, with In the Land of Blood and Honey (2011), Unbroken (2014), By the Sea (2015), and First They Killed My Father (2017). In addition to her film career, Jolie is noted for her humanitarian efforts, for which she has received a Jean Hersholt Humanitarian Award and an honorary damehood of the Order of St Michael and St George (DCMG), among other honors. She promotes various causes, including conservation, education, and women's rights, and is most noted for her advocacy on behalf of refugees as a Special Envoy for the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees (UNHCR). As a public figure, Jolie has been cited as one of the most influential and powerful people in the American entertainment industry. For a number of years, she was cited as the world's most beautiful woman by various media outlets, and her personal life is the subject of wide publicity. Divorced from actors Jonny Lee Miller and Billy Bob Thornton, she separated from her third husband, actor Brad Pitt, in September 2016. They have six children together, three of whom were adopted internationally. Early life and family Born in Los Angeles, California, Jolie is the daughter of actors Jon Voight and Marcheline Bertrand. She is the sister of actor James Haven, and the niece of singer-songwriter Chip Taylor[2] and geologist and volcanologist Barry Voight.[3] Her godparents are actors Jacqueline Bisset and Maximilian Schell.[4] On her father's side, Jolie is of German and Slovak descent,[5][6] and on her mother's side, she is of primarily French Canadian, Dutch, and German ancestry.[5] Like her mother, Jolie has stated that she is part Iroquois,[7] although her only known indigenous ancestors were 17th-century Hurons.[5][8] After her parents' separation in 1976, Jolie and her brother lived with their mother, who had abandoned her acting ambitions to focus on raising her children.[9] Her mother raised her Catholic, but did not require her to go to church.[10] As a child, she often watched films with her mother and it was this, rather than her father's successful career, that inspired her interest in acting,[11] though at age five she had a bit part in Voight's Lookin' to Get Out (1982).[12] When Jolie was six years old, Bertrand and her live-in partner, filmmaker Bill Day, moved the family to Palisades, New York;[13] they returned to Los Angeles five years later.[9] Jolie then decided she wanted to act and enrolled at the Lee Strasberg Theatre Institute, where she trained for two years and appeared in several stage productions. Joe Jonas soaked up the sun in Australia with a group of beautiful women, but none of them were Sophie Turner! Why is he hanging out with all of these gorgeous girls?  Joe Jonas looks like he’s having a blast on the beach! The 28-year-old was spotted surrounded by a group of bikini-clad women on Bondi Beach in Sydney, Australia on Feb. 22 — but none of which were Sophie Turner. Don’t worry, though! The girls were just fans of the DNCE frontman, who graciously posed for photos with them on the sunny shoreline. How sweet!  The “Cake By The Ocean” singer went Down Under to shoot the upcoming season of The Voice Australia, which he will be a celebrity coach on, alongside Delta Goodrem, Kelly Rowland, and Boy George. While his fiancée didn’t make the trip, the couple were able to spend some quality time together before Joe’s excursion to the Southern Hemisphere. Earlier this month, the pair enjoyed a romantic getaway to a private island in the Maldives, and then followed up the vacation with a huge celebration in New York City for Sophie’s 22nd birthday on Feb. 21. Joe’s brother Nick Jonas even commemorated the occasion by giving a sweet shout-out to the birthday girl. He shared a photo from Sophie and Joe’s engagement party in Nov. 2017, and captioned the pic that also included Kevin and Frankie Jonas, “Happy Birthday @sophiet You’re super cool! We all think so!” Aww, it’s like she’s already part of the family!  You can also bet that the Game Of Thrones star wouldn’t mind her fiancé posing for photos with a bunch of beauties on the beach. On her birthday, Sophie posted a video to her Instagram story jamming out to “22” by Taylor Swift (as any self-respecting 22-year-old would do on their birthday). As you may remember, Tay and Joe used to be a ~thing~ back in 2008. But clearly, that doesn’t phase the X-Men: Apocalypse star in the slightest — nor should it. Taylor has her own Joe (Alwyn) now, and the Josie star has made it clear there’s no bad blood between them. She even came to the singer’s defense when people on Twitter questioned her inclusion in TIME‘s Person of the Year issue in December. Basically Sophie is the best, and we’re sure Joe knows that!  HollywoodLifers, are you sad that Sophie isn’t in Australia with Joe?

Justin Bieber has explained to fans why he cancelled the remainder of his Purpose world tour, saying “I want my mind heart and soul to be sustainable”.  After playing 150 concerts across 40 countries during the world tour, Bieber cancelled the final 14, saying he was “just resting, getting some relaxation”. In a message on Instagram, he has elaborated on his reasons.  “I’ve learned the more you appreciate your calling the more you want to protect your calling,” he wrote. “Me taking this time right now is me saying I want to be SUSTAINABLE... so that I can be the man I want to be, the husband I eventually want to be, and the father I want to be.”  Perhaps referring to the string of fractious incidents he has been involved with, including punching a Spanish fan, driving drunk in a Lamborghini and being banned from China, he added: “Learning and growing hasn’t always been easy but knowing I’m not alone has kept me going. I have let my insecurities get the best of me at times, I let my broken relationships dictate the way I acted toward people and the way I treated them. I let bitterness, jealousy and fear run my life.!!!! ... What I’m not gonna do is be ashamed of my mistakes. I wanna be a man that learns from them and grows from them.!!”  He signed off by apologising for any grammatical errors: “I THINK THERES SOMETHING SPECIAL ABOUT IMPERFECTIONS!!”  With the tour now finished, the statement closes a chapter of his career. His album Purpose spawned a series of colossal hit singles, including What Do You Mean, Love Yourself, and Sorry, which until recently was the most streamed song of all time globally. It was replaced by Luis Fonsi and Daddy Yankee’s Despacito, which Bieber also features on.  Guardian Service

Not all women want to have children, and that’s perfectly OK. While “normal” people are pressured by friends and family to get pregnant, celebrities are pressured by the whole world. And compared to other celebs, nobody has been more publicly pressured than Jennifer Aniston. The world is obsessed with her having a baby!  MORE: JENNIFER ANISTON’S AND JUSTIN THEROUX’S DOG CUSTODY BATTLE  It seems like no one has been reported pregnant more times than Jen.The earliest reports date back to 1999, back when the world first fell in love with her on Friends and she began dating Brad Pitt. Since 1999 there have been more than 55 published articles about her being pregnant both in and outside the U.S. It was even reported by the Huffington Post that despite the possibility that the U.S would go into war “Jennifer Aniston Pregnant” was still searched more than “are we at war” on Google.  Jennifer did express in early interviews that she wanted to become a mother one day and from then on the world was waiting. The obsession with her character on Friends—and the fact that Rachel did get pregnant—could be the reason why fans kept a close eye on is she or isn’t she in real life. In fact, the roles Jennifer took on in her career often had a direct impact on when and how her pregnancy rumors evolved.  Over time the extremity of the rumors changed, but many of the triggers are the same. Rumors start any time she is wearing a loose shirt or looks “bloated,” whenever she is in a new relationship, and whenever that relationship ends. And most importantly, the rumors evolve as she ages.  MORE: JENNIFER ANISTON BANS THE WORD “BABY” AROUND HER  Take a look at almost two decades worth of pregnancy rumors and how they progressed:

President Trump aimed to project a positive and optimistic tone during his inaugural State of the Union address on Tuesday evening. However, notable figures in the entertainment industry took to Twitter to express their strong reactions towards the speech. A wide range of emotions ranging from anger to ridicule, skepticism, and sarcasm pervaded the responses of most celebrities. For instance, Josh Gad sarcastically likened the live broadcast of the State of the Union to an audacious, extended screening of the 'Purge' movie franchise on network television. 
Late-night comedians, such as Jimmy Kimmel, used the occasion to incorporate humor into their responses. Kimmel had Stormy Daniels, the adult film star who reportedly received payment to maintain silence about her alleged affair with Trump, as a guest on his show 'Jimmy Kimmel Live!' Stephen Colbert, another late-night host, also employed his Twitter feed during the speech to comment cynically. He predicted that Trump would likely assert that his State of the Union address had a more significant turnout than Obama's.
Nevertheless, some celebrities voiced praise for Trump's speech. Conservative commentator Ann Coulter commended Trump's delivery, describing it as 'beautiful'. Chuck Woolery expressed appreciation for the speech's message of renewed optimism and prosperity for all Americans, emphasizing its inclusivity regardless of factors such as race, creed, or religion.
On the contrary, certain celebrities, like Elizabeth Banks, admitted they did not manage to endure the entirety of the speech due to perceived misinformation and unanswered questions. Banks chose to switch to listening to Tom Petty instead. Similarly, Questlove Gomez expressed uncertainty about whether the address had concluded.
A few celebrities decided not to watch at all. Chance the Rapper urged his followers to retweet his message if they were not tuning into the State of the Union. 
The reactions on Twitter were varied, with several notable figures sharing their opinions. Social activist and actress Ashley Judd used the platform to outline her vision for America, emphasizing the value of inclusivity regardless of religious beliefs, race, or country of origin. Jeffrey Wright expressed his deep aversion to Trump and his supporters, referring to them as a "bizarre cult of self-interested sycophants." Mark Ruffalo called for a focus on job creation and the needs of working people, rather than the interests of Wall Street.
These responses exemplify the diverse range of opinions and emotions elicited by President Trump's State of the Union address, showcasing the intense and polarizing nature of contemporary political discourse.

Reality TV star Kim Kardashian recently engaged in a crucial meeting with US President Donald Trump, where they focused on the topic of prison reforms. Kardashian, known for her entrepreneurship and influence, had been dedicating significant time to this cause alongside her legal team in order to secure parole for Alice Johnson, a woman who had received a life sentence without the possibility of parole in 1997 due to money laundering and drug conspiracy charges. As a result of their meeting, Alice was ultimately released from the Aliceville Correctional Facility in Alabama.
When asked about the potential of a political career, Kardashian expressed that while she is not actively considering such a path, she would not completely dismiss the idea of running for office. CNN interviewed her on this matter, to which she responded, "I guess never say never. But that’s not going to be like, ‘Kim’s running.’ That’s not where I am." Moreover, Kardashian emphasized her desire to utilize her celebrity status for the betterment of society, stating, "I honestly saw that if I could use my platform just to do something for one person, that it opens the conversation for so much more and for other people to want to do the same thing. If more people would just put their personal feelings aside and talk about really important issues that have to be discussed, then so much more can get done."

The royal wedding, which is set to take place next month, is expected to be a costly event. The average cost of a wedding for couples in the US and the UK is around $34,000 (£23,700), a significant expense for a one-day affair. However, when it comes to the royals, money is no object. Kensington Palace will be covering the expenses, a departure from the traditional practice of the bride's family bearing the cost. This was also the case for Kate Middleton and Prince William's wedding in 2011, where Middleton only paid for her dress. The total cost of their celebration was a staggering $34 million (£23.7 million). Meghan Markle and Prince Harry's wedding is estimated to exceed that, with a price tag of over $45.8 million (£32 million), according to Bride Book. While the venue, St. George's Chapel, is free for the couple, security is the biggest expense. With the responsibility of protecting Markle, Prince Harry, and their guests, including snipers, undercover police, military technology, and security drones, Kensington Palace is expected to spend $43 million (£30 million) on security alone. The remaining costs, including food, cakes, entertainment, wardrobe, and the honeymoon, amount to approximately $2.8 million.

Brad Pitt, a prominent figure in Hollywood, recently dispelled rumors of him suffering from a rare disease that was allegedly "eating him away." While this news may come as a relief to his fans, it is worth noting that Pitt has shown remarkable dedication to raising awareness and funds for those afflicted with rare diseases.
One such condition is Epidermolysis Bullosa (EB), a rare skin disorder. Pitt is an honorary member of the Epidermolysis Bullosa Medical Research Foundation (EBMRF), an organization committed to supporting individuals with this debilitating disorder. Earlier this year, Pitt made an appearance at the Rock4EB charity event, where he introduced singer Chris Cornell, in aid of the EBMRF.
Additionally, Pitt has openly discussed his own self-diagnosis with another rare condition known as prosopagnosia, also referred to as face blindness. In a 2013 interview with Esquire Magazine, he shared his struggles in recognizing familiar faces and how he often forgets people he has met before. It is important to acknowledge that self-diagnosis differs from a formal diagnosis, and certain nuances may be overlooked.
Prosopagnosia is a condition characterized by the inability to recognize familiar faces or stimuli, such as objects or animals. Those affected by this condition often rely on other cues, such as voice, walking style, and hairstyle, to identify individuals. The genetic cause of developmental prosopagnosia is not yet fully understood, but familial evidence suggests a possible autosomal dominant inheritance pattern.
In contrast, Epidermolysis Bullosa is a group of severe genetic skin disorders that primarily impact children. It results in painful skin blistering and erosion throughout the body. The most severe form, known as recessive dystrophic epidermolysis bullosa, involves chronic blistering, painful wounds, joint stiffness, and other complications. This condition arises due to a deficiency in type VII collagen (C7), caused by mutations in the COL7A1 gene.
Individuals with Epidermolysis Bullosa endure a lifetime of excruciating pain, with limited treatment options available to alleviate their symptoms. Medical researchers and organizations like the EBMRF strive to find effective solutions for those affected by this devastating disease.
Brad Pitt's involvement in raising awareness for these rare diseases highlights the importance of supporting individuals battling such conditions. His dedication to these causes serves as an inspiration to others, encouraging them to join the fight against these debilitating disorders and bring hope to those in need.

President Trump, speaking from Trump Tower in New York City, stated that he held both the protesters and counter-protesters responsible for the violence in Charlottesville, Virginia. Trump defended his initial response, claiming he needed to gather all the facts before making a statement, and blamed the press for being dishonest in its coverage. He also questioned the removal of Confederate statues and monuments, expressing concern that tributes to historical figures like George Washington and Thomas Jefferson would be targeted next.

Lindsay Lohan, the esteemed 31-year-old actress, has expressed her utmost admiration for the iconic DC Comics character Batgirl. In her quest to secure the role of the Gotham City heroine, she recently embarked on a Twitter campaign, urging director Joss Whedon to consider casting her. Taking to the platform, she posed the question to her followers: "RT if I should star in the new BATGIRL movie and everyone tell @joss [sic]". Lohan's determination to earn an audition for the role has prompted her to reach out to Ben Affleck, renowned for his portrayal of Batman in the DC Extended Universe, for assistance in securing the part of Batgirl, a role known for its captivating portrayal of a courageous redhead.
A reliable source has revealed to Australia's NW Magazine that Lohan has persistently attempted to communicate with Affleck, as she admires his resilience in the face of adversity. Affleck, having overcome personal challenges, notably sharing his experiences with alcoholism while visiting Lohan during her time in rehab in 2013, inspired her to embark on her own journey towards sobriety. This encounter marked the beginning of a friendship between the two actors.
However, Lohan faces formidable competition for the role of Batgirl, with Emma Stone currently considered a frontrunner for the Warner Bros. Pictures and DC Films project. Nonetheless, director Joss Whedon, 53, has expressed his desire to cast an unknown actress, emphasizing the importance of finding the perfect fit for the iconic role. In his own words, "I doubt it will be a name. This is somewhere where you go and find Batgirl and then you cast her. I'm not against movie stars, they're great, but you need somebody who's going to be just right."
Lohan, who divides her time between America and Dubai, has found solace in the United Arab Emirates, allowing her to embrace a more private life. Reflecting on her experiences, the accomplished star of "Mean Girls" admits that she struggled to navigate fame at a young age. She relishes the serenity offered by Dubai, where she can have fun in a different, more fulfilling manner.
In conclusion, Lindsay Lohan's unwavering determination to portray Batgirl, combined with her friendship with Ben Affleck, has placed her in contention for the highly coveted role. However, she must surpass stiff competition, including Emma Stone, as director Joss Whedon seeks an exceptional yet unfamiliar talent to encapsulate the essence of Batgirl. Lohan, having cultivated a more private and fulfilling life in Dubai, is eagerly awaiting the outcome of this exciting casting process.

Hugh Jackman Addresses Future Roles After Wolverine 
In a recent appearance on The Late Show with Stephen Colbert, renowned actor Hugh Jackman sat down for a candid interview, discussing his legendary portrayal of Wolverine and shedding light on his plans for the future. As the segment unfolded, Colbert took the opportunity to ask Jackman a burning question that has captivated the imagination of fans worldwide: will we finally get to see "fat Jackman"?
After twenty years of bringing the iconic clawed mutant to life, Jackman bid a heartfelt farewell to the Marvel universe with his poignant performance in Logan. Consequently, fans have eagerly awaited news regarding the direction his esteemed career would take post-Wolverine. Colbert skillfully interjected, focusing on an idea that had become a topic of great speculation: a potential transformation in physique for the esteemed actor.
With the utmost grace and composure, Jackman addressed Colbert's inquiry, shedding light on the diverse roles he plans to pursue beyond his Wolverine days. The actor expressed sincere gratitude for the immense support he has received throughout his career, recognizing the deep bond formed between himself and his fans during his tenure as Wolverine.
"I am truly humbled by the unwavering love and dedication from my fans, who have been instrumental in making Wolverine the character he is today. However, the time has come for me to explore new horizons, diving into a wide range of roles that will challenge me both physically and emotionally," Jackman conveyed, his voice filled with both admiration and excitement.
While the prospect of seeing "fat Jackman" may be tantalizing to some, the accomplished actor emphasized his desire to pursue roles that invite him to push his boundaries and explore uncharted territories. Jackman's undeniable talent is no secret, and his ability to fully embody and immerse himself in his characters has earned him widespread acclaim.
As we bid farewell to one era, it is evident that Jackman’s dedication to his craft will drive him toward new creative avenues. While fans may have to let go of the dreams of seeing Jackman transform into an alternate physical form, they can instead anticipate witnessing his multifaceted skills breathe life into a plethora of diverse, captivating characters.
With the curtain slowly drawing to a close on his iconic portrayal of Wolverine, Hugh Jackman emerges as a beacon of inspiration who continues to blaze trails in the realm of acting. As we eagerly anticipate his next project, it is certain that Jackman's boundless talent and unwavering commitment will leave an indelible mark on the silver screen, ensuring his legacy lives on for generations to come.

There has been an outpouring of speculation within Hollywood's elite circles as paparazzi recently spotted renowned actors Halle Berry and Keanu Reeves displaying an unprecedented display of camaraderie during the filming of their eagerly anticipated movie, "John Wick: Chapter 3." The undeniable chemistry between these two remarkable stars has ignited rumors suggesting that their on-set connection may extend beyond the silver screen.
As news spread like wildfire throughout the entertainment industry, fans and followers alike could not help but wonder if an enchanting love story was beginning to unfold behind the cameras. Berry and Reeves were captured in numerous photographs sporting radiant smiles and exhibiting a level of closeness previously unseen by the public eye, fueling the fervent speculations surrounding their relationship.
Moviegoers and avid fans familiar with the work of Berry and Reeves are acutely aware of their exceptional talents and their unparalleled ability to captivate audiences. Yet, it is their apparent connection off-screen that has us all questioning whether something more than friendship is blossoming between the two remarkable individuals.
While neither party has officially stepped forward to address the swirling rumors, their undeniable chemistry provides a vivid canvas upon which speculation can flourish. The energy and camaraderie emanating from their on-set interactions leaves little doubt that a special bond exists between the accomplished actors.
Sources close to the duo have disclosed exclusively that Berry and Reeves have cultivated a profoundly deep friendship, forged through their shared passion for their craft. Their remarkable working relationship has made the set of "John Wick: Chapter 3" a breeding ground for artistic inspiration, pushing both stars to new heights of excellence.
The truth behind these captivating pictures may only be revealed in due course, as Berry and Reeves continue to work side-by-side to bring their characters to life. It is undeniable, however, that these two Hollywood icons bring a unique and unparalleled dynamic to their roles and share an undeniable magnetic connection that has captured the imagination of not only their devoted followers but also the industry as a whole.
As the story unfolds, one thing remains certain: the world eagerly awaits the next chapter in the evolving relationship between Halle Berry and Keanu Reeves. Their enigmatic on-set alliance has sparked curiosity and is set to propel their upcoming film, "John Wick: Chapter 3," into uncharted territory. Whether this dynamic duo is destined to become more than just friends remains to be seen, but for now, fans and admirers alike will have to wait in anticipation for the revelation that only time will disclose.

Tobey Maguire did not try to pursue Emma Stone and obtain her phone number at the Chateau Marmont in Los Angeles, as reported by a fabricated tabloid. Gossip Cop has confirmed that this assertion is false. According to Life & Style, Maguire recently noticed Stone at the luxurious Hollywood hotel and was attempting to catch her attention. An anonymous source from the publication alleges that the actor eventually approached Stone, showering her with cliché compliments and praising her popularity in Hollywood. The same source claims that Stone initially showed no interest but eventually obliged by giving him her number and suggesting a coffee meeting before swiftly leaving. However, Gossip Cop reached out to a trusted source close to Maguire, who revealed that the tabloid's entire narrative is entirely made up and did not occur. It is disappointing but not surprising that Life & Style published a completely fictitious story. In the past, Gossip Cop debunked the outlet's false accusation that Eva Mendes was envious of Stone's friendship with Ryan Gosling. This recent claim is equally baseless.

Justin Bieber brought some serious bling with him to the Bahamas. The singer proposed to Hailey Baldwin after only a few weeks of dating (but close to a decade of friendship) during a special island engagement moon, and the model is now wearing not one but two rings on her left hand.  In photos circulating social media, Baldwin is seen wearing a huge oval diamond engagement ring set on what looks to be a rose gold pavé diamond band. During the production of the Netflix show Maniac, a close friendship developed between the actors Justin and Emma. This has led to speculation about their romantic involvement during a period when Justin and his former wife, Jen, were still married. Jen, who has previously witnessed her spouse becoming involved with a co-star on a film set, understandably has concerns about this situation. Reflecting on Justin's past relationship with Angelina Jolie, Jen cannot help but question if history is repeating itself. Adding to her distress, Jen has considered Emma a close friend for some time and feels betrayed by recent revelations of Emma and Justin's interactions. She interprets Emma's decision to align with Justin after their split as a betrayal of their friendship. Jen seeks clarity regarding the timeline of their involvement, as their recent outing suggested a level of familiarity that goes beyond merely a first encounter. Jen is deeply humiliated by these circumstances and feels manipulated. The separation between Jen and Justin occurred in February of this year, and Justin has maintained his friendship with Emma since then. Publicly, Justin has posted pictures of them together on his Instagram, but he has insisted that they are merely friends. However, they were spotted attending a Louis Vuitton show as a pair just a month after the split. Additionally, Justin has been linked to other women, including Aubrey Plaza and Petra Collins, while Emma has reportedly been dating writer Dave McCarthy since last year. Rumors have circulated that Jen and her ex-husband Brad Pitt, who recently finalized his divorce from Angelina Jolie, may be reconciling. Furthermore, there have been allegations of Jen's pregnancy with Brad's child, supported by her concealment of what appeared to be a baby bump upon disembarking from a private plane a few weeks ago. However, recent controversies suggest that Brad Pitt is secretly involved with architect Neri Oxman, leaving Jen to consider the possibility of single parenthood. Since their separation, Jen and Justin have maintained distance, and sources indicate that they had an intense argument when Justin returned to their Bel Air home to collect his remaining belongings. Now, with the public release of images depicting Justin's intimate date with Emma, it is expected that the relationship between Justin and Jen will become even more strained. Mariah Carey, the renowned pop diva, has recently embarked on a new and unexpected venture for the year 2018. Surprising her fans and capturing the attention of the internet, Carey has decided to venture into the world of selling T-shirts. Yes, you read that correctly! 
The internet has been abuzz with excitement over Mariah Carey's recent endeavors. From her unforgettable, albeit controversial, actions at the Golden Globes, where she "stole" Meryl Streep's limelight, to her seemingly innocuous tweet that has singlehandedly altered the course of brunch forever, Carey has become the talk of the town. 
However, it is her iconic and meme-inducing moment during her New Year's Eve performance that has prompted the pop diva to delve into the realm of merchandise. The incident, which marked the first of 2018, garnered significant attention and has proven to be a catalyst for Carey's unexpected leap into the T-shirt business. 
The sheer impact of Carey's meme-inducing moment cannot be overstated. Capturing the hearts of internet trolls and social media enthusiasts, her performance quickly spread throughout online platforms, transforming her into an overnight internet sensation. 
Recognizing the immense popularity and market demand surrounding her New Year's Eve performance, Carey has taken a bold step by capitalizing on her notoriety. By selling T-shirts inspired by her infamous onstage moment, she is meeting the desires of her dedicated fan base, ensuring they can now wear a piece of pop culture history. 
While some may view this endeavor as a mere publicity stunt, it is important to acknowledge the strategic mindset behind Carey's decision. In today's digital age, viral moments are fleeting, and capitalizing on them is essential for any public figure seeking to maintain relevance. By aligning her merchandise with the unforgettable incident, Carey is embracing the power of social media and transforming her fleeting fame into a tangible and marketable asset. 
Moreover, this foray into the T-shirt business demonstrates Mariah Carey's astute business acumen. Not content with being solely recognized as a talented performer, she realizes the importance of diversifying her portfolio. Through selling T-shirts, Carey is expanding her brand and tapping into a new revenue stream that will undoubtedly complement her already flourishing music career. 
As we eagerly anticipate what the future holds for Mariah Carey, one thing remains crystal clear: her ability to turn a momentary occurrence into a timeless business opportunity is nothing short of admirable. With her meme-inducing T-shirts poised to captivate the market, Carey has proven once again that she is not only a force to be reckoned with in the music industry but also a savvy entrepreneur.

Beyoncé Rumored To Be Asking For Silent Delivery  As the countdown to Blueprint 1 and Blueprint 2’s arrival continues, the stories about Bey’s birth plans abound. First, we heard she planned to give birth at home, then they said her security has been running weekly drills to practice their approach to Cedars-Sinai and now there’s a report that Bey wants silence in the delivery room.  According to Naughty Gossip reports:  “Beyoncé likes peace and calm around her. She has zero time for drama and gossip. She likes her inner circle to be soft spoken if they have to talk at all. And you can expect the same will be true when she gives birth to the twins,” sources tell Straight Shuter. “You can only get into her private life if you are invited. She is very guarded and protects her privacy at all cost. She likes to be surrounded with peaceful colors and soft sounds. This will be of utmost importance for her when giving birth.”  This story is almost like opening up a fortune cookie or visiting your average storefront psychic. EVERYBODY knows Beyoncé is private. THAT doesn’t take an exclusive source to figure out.  Silent birth is a real thing though – something that Scientologists practice and Katie Holmes even did when she gave birth to Suri, but as much as Bey loves music we don’t really see her doing a silent birth.  Speaking of Bey’s love of music… Hit the flip for some recently posted pics of her from a Michael Jackson/Prince party.  GettyImages/Instagram

In Bridgehampton on Saturday, despite the hot and humid weather, a large group of people gathered at Topping Rose House for Jill Zarin's annual luncheon. Jill, the former Real Housewife of New York, was seen wearing an A-line Carolina Herrera dress, mingling with fans, taking photos, and catching up with old friends. Trying to get an interview with her turned into a scavenger hunt as she was constantly on the move. Throughout the event, there were various vendors selling products, including wine and sex toys. Guests also had the opportunity to receive a vitamin infusion while sitting under the sun, creating a sauna-like experience. Housewives from different parts of the country, such as Vicki Gunvalson of Orange County and LeeAnne Locken of Dallas, flew in to attend the luncheon, which also served as a fundraiser for Thyroid Cancer Research in memory of Jill's late husband, Bobby. When initially approached for an interview, Jill sent her daughter, Ally Shapiro, in her place. Ally shared her thoughts on last year's luncheon when her stepfather was battling cancer. She mentioned that despite the difficult circumstances, he encouraged them to enjoy the event. Ally, who now lives in London, admitted that she finds it challenging to watch old episodes of Real Housewives due to the portrayal of her struggling to connect with her stepfather. She shared how strangers in the UK recognize her from the show. Ally also mentioned that her mother has been casually dating a man she plays tennis with, which has been a positive distraction for her since she lives in London. Dina Lohan, dressed in a metallic green blazer and shorts set, arrived fashionably late and was immediately surrounded by people wanting to chat or take pictures with her. Eventually, she settled down and spoke about her daughter Lindsay's upcoming reality show for MTV, which is inspired by Vanderpump Rules and follows Lindsay and the employees of her new Lohan Beach Club. Dina mentioned that the show is being produced by the same company that worked on Lindsay's E! reality show from a decade ago. She also revealed that Lindsay's younger sister, Ali, has contributed to the show by providing the theme song. During the conversation, a friend of Dina asked if Ali, like Lindsay, had moved to L.A. for work, to which Dina firmly responded that Ali is in New York with her and she intends to keep her daughters close. Finally, Jill Zarin took a moment to pause and breathe. Although she is no longer a part of Bravo's Real Housewives, she still possesses the skills of schmoozing like a housewife. Jill mentioned that she has been keeping up with the latest season of the show and received a message of support from Luann de Lesseps, who recently entered rehab. Jill concluded our conversation by promoting her new line of rugs, called Jill Zarin Rugs, which are designed to be pet-proof, beautiful, and affordable.

Kylie Jenner, the renowned cosmetics expert and expectant mother, made a discreet appearance at her mother Kris Jenner's annual Christmas Eve party in Los Angeles. Although Kylie did not feature in any of the photos shared on social media by her KarJenner family members, a trusted insider reveals that she fully participated in the celebration away from the limelight. Maintaining her desire for privacy, Kylie did not draw attention to her baby bump during the event. Meanwhile, her sister Khloé Kardashian, who recently confirmed her own pregnancy with boyfriend Tristan Thompson, proudly showcased her burgeoning belly in a sparkling jumpsuit and white fur coat. Khloé radiated happiness throughout the night, often touching and proudly displaying her cute baby bump. She also shared an Instagram post depicting her gently caressing her belly, extending warm Christmas wishes to her followers. The Christmas festivities also brought together Kim Kardashian West, Kourtney Kardashian, Kendall Jenner, and their children. Notably, Scott Disick, Kourtney's ex-boyfriend, attended the event without his new girlfriend Sofia Richie. Despite the presence of Kourtney's current boyfriend Younes Bendjima, Scott and Younes maintained a civil interaction, exchanging greetings with no signs of discomfort. The guest list was further enriched by Kim's husband Kanye West, celebrity hairstylists Jen Atkin and Chris Appleton, singer Christina Aguilera, and the executive producer of Keeping Up with the Kardashians, Ryan Seacrest. Kris Jenner, the hostess, exhibited joy and enthusiasm throughout the night, actively participating in the festivities alongside Kim and Khloé. Notably, there were no conflicts or tensions, and the party was described as a resounding success. On Christmas morning, the family convened at Kourtney's residence to celebrate the holiday. Dressed in matching elf-patterned onesies and beanies, they exchanged gifts and cherished the joyful atmosphere. In a Snapchat video, Khloé playfully teased Kylie, who appeared to have been present at the Christmas Eve party despite assumptions to the contrary. Despite the ongoing speculation surrounding her pregnancy, Kylie has refrained from making any public confirmations. Residing close to her home in Calabasas, she has deliberately chosen to maintain a low profile. Adapting to the changes in her body, Kylie has opted for more privacy during this phase of her life. Her loved ones visit her regularly at her home, providing companionship and support during this exciting and transformative time.

'Khloe is not a Kardashian': TWO of her father's ex-wives claim he expressed doubts over the paternity of the youngest sister  Father Robert's ex-wives allege he said she wasn't his child  Khloe hits out at wives on Twitter calling them 'disgusting' and 'low'  Mum Kris has admitted to affairs during marriage to late lawyer    More drama erupted for Kim Kardashian and her family, as the ex-wife of her late father today claimed Kim's sister Khloe was not his daughter.    Two of Robert Kardashian's ex-wives have come forward saying he confided in them that he was unsure of the paternity of the now-27-year-old.  Jan Ashley, who married the businessman after Khloe's mother Kris Jenner, said: 'Khloe is not his kid -- he told me that after we got married.'  And Ellen Pierson, 63, who married Robert in 2003 just two months before his death, has also come forward after eight years of silence to 'tell the truth' about the Kardashian family.  Claims: Two of Robert Kardashian's ex-wives have come forward claiming the lawyer told them Khloe Kardashian, left, was not his real daughter, like older sisters Kim and Kourtney  The reality star has hit back at the claims, calling them 'really low'. She claims Khloe, who is married to Dallas Mavericks basketballer Lamar Odom, knew she had a different father to her sisters and younger brother Rob.  'Khloe brought it up all the time. '[But] he never would have considered a DNA test. He loved her very much. Robert did question the fact that Khloe was his,' Ellen said. 'Any normal man would if they knew their wife had cheated on him.' Khloe has responded to the claims today on Twitter.  Daddy's little girl: Robert Kardashian, pictured with Khloe as a child, referred to having four biological children in court documents filed in 1999 She wrote: 'The audacity you have to mention my father’s name like this! Should be ashamed of urself! I let a lot of things slide but this one is really low… YOU ARE DISGUSTING! (yes you know who YOU are).'    High-profile: Robert represented O.J. Simpson in his murder trial in 1994  Kris, 56, recently admitted in her new book that she cheated on Robert during their marriage.  Since Robert's death, Ellen had experienced financial difficulties, filing for Chapter 7 bankruptcy in 2010.  The home she and Robert shared in Indian Wells, California, was sold after going into foreclosure in October.  Kris remarried Olympian Bruce Jenner in 1991 and the couple had two daughters, Kendall and Kylie.  Bruce already had four children from two previous marriages: Burt, Casey, Brody, and Brandon.    Khloe is often talking about how she looks nothing like her sisters, and Kris has been quoted as saying people asked her whether she was 'the milkman's daughter' when she was born.    On Khloe's blog in June 2010, she shared a number of pictures of her and the attorney.  She wrote: 'Father’s Day is two days away, so in preparation I wanted to post this photo album (mostly old school pics) dedicated to my dad and to Bruce.  'I was seriously the luckiest girl in the world growing up because I had two amazing dads who not only loved us kids more than anything, but adored each other as well. This article is about the television series. For the novel, see Thirteen Reasons Why 13 Reasons Why (stylized onscreen as TH1RTEEN R3ASONS WHY) is an American teen drama web television series developed for Netflix by Brian Yorkey, based on the 2007 novel Thirteen Reasons Why by Jay Asher. The series revolves around seventeen year old high school student, Clay Jensen, and his deceased female friend Hannah Baker, who has committed suicide after failing to cope with the culture, gossip and lack of support from her friends and her school. A box of cassette tapes recorded by Hannah in the lead up to her suicide detail thirteen reasons why she ended her life. The series is produced by July Moon Productions, Kicked to the Curb Productions, Anonymous Content and Paramount Television, with Yorkey and Diana Son serving as showrunners. Dylan Minnette stars as Clay, while Katherine Langford plays Hannah. Christian Navarro, Alisha Boe, Brandon Flynn, Justin Prentice, Miles Heizer, Ross Butler, Devin Druid, Amy Hargreaves, Derek Luke, Kate Walsh, and Brian d'Arcy James also star. A film from Universal Pictures based on Thirteen Reasons Why began development in February 2011, with Selena Gomez set to star as Hannah, before being shelved in favor of a television series and Netflix ordering the show straight to series in October 2015, with Gomez instead serving as an executive producer. The first season was released on Netflix on March 31, 2017. It received positive reviews from critics and audiences, who praised its subject matter and acting, particularly the performances of Minnette and Langford. For her performance, Langford received a Golden Globe Award nomination for Best Actress in a Drama Series. However, its graphic depiction of issues such as suicide and rape, along with other mature content prompted concerns from mental health professionals. In response, Netflix added a warning card and from March 2018, a video that plays at the start of each season warning viewers about its themes.[2] In May 2017, Netflix renewed 13 Reasons Why for a second season; filming began the next month and concluded that December. The second season was released on May 18, 2018, and received negative reviews from critics and mixed reviews from audiences. A third season was ordered in June 2018 and is set to be released in 2019. Critical and audience reaction to the series has been divided, with the program generating controversy between audiences and industry reviewers. Premise [ edit ] In season one, seventeen year old Clay Jensen returns home from school one day to find a mysterious box on his porch. Inside he discovers seven cassette tapes recorded by Hannah Baker, his deceased classmate and unrequited love, who committed suicide two weeks earlier. On the tapes, Hannah unfolds an intensely emotional audio diary, detailing why she decided to end her life. It appears each person who receives this package of old-style tapes is fundamentally related to why she killed herself. Clay is not the first to receive the tapes, but there is implied detail as to how he should pass the tapes on after hearing them. There appears to be an order to distribution of the tapes, with an additional copy held by an overseer should the plan go awry. Each tape recording refers to a different person involved in Hannah's life contributing to a reason for her suicide. The tapes refer to both friends and enemies. In season two, months after Hannah's suicide, Clay and the other people mentioned on the tapes, as well as close friends and Hannah's family members, become embroiled in a civil legal battle between Hannah's parents and Liberty High School. Alleging negligence on the part of the school, Hannah's mother pursues her perception of justice, while her reluctance to settle pre-trial and her personal circumstances eventually break up her marriage with Hannah's father. The story unfolds with narratives illustrating Hannah's story told by those who present in court at trial. Clay, who

Actress Drew Barrymore and actor Timothy Olyphant were seen taking a break on the set of their show Santa Clarita Diet in Los Angeles this Wednesday. Drew appeared cheerful, holding a straw beverage while engaging in conversation with crew members. She sported a casual look, wearing a black sweater with rolled-up sleeves, matched with black pants and walnut brown sandals. Timothy opted for a more stylish ensemble, donning dark brown boots, fitted jeans, and a blue checked shirt. The show, a dark comedy, centers around Drew's character's struggle to control her cannibalistic cravings with the support of her husband, portrayed by Timothy. Additionally, Liv Hewson plays their on-screen daughter, Abby. Santa Clarita Diet was created by Victor Fresco, known for other shows like Better Off Ted and Mad About You. Timothy has been married to Alexis Knief since 1991, and they have three teenage children together. Drew, on the other hand, divorced her third husband, Will Kopelman, in 2016, after previous marriages to Jeremy Thomas and Tom Green.

Kylie Jenner's alleged pregnancy has captured the attention of fans and the media, with numerous headlines speculating on various aspects of her journey into motherhood. Despite the rampant speculation, the 20-year-old reality star has not publicly confirmed the news. This is surprising, given the Kardashian-Jenner family's history of sharing personal details with the world, which has played a significant role in their overwhelming success and popularity.
The lack of confirmation has only intensified the curiosity surrounding Kylie's rumored pregnancy. With reports suggesting that she is due in February and expecting a baby girl with rapper Travis Scott, fans eagerly await any clues or announcements from the young star. Even Kylie's absence from the family's traditional Christmas card caused a stir among her devoted followers.
Fans have resorted to searching for glimpses of the truth themselves, as TMZ released blurry footage of Kylie's recent public appearance, where she was dressed in loose clothing. Additionally, a magazine photoshoot featured Kylie holding a baby lamb in a way that strategically concealed her growing belly. Some speculate that the official announcement may coincide with an episode of "Keeping Up With the Kardashians," as rumors circulated that the season finale would be titled "We're Expecting!" However, this information has since been removed from the Wikipedia page.
If Kylie does give birth this month, her child will join the Kardashian family's newest addition, Chicago West, born via surrogate to Kim and Kanye West in January. Khloe Kardashian is also expecting a baby with NBA player Tristan Thompson, due in March. While some believe that Kylie's baby may make a delayed entrance into the public eye, insiders claim that Kylie is savoring her time away from the spotlight and has no plans to sell any photos of her child.
As the Kardashian-Jenner empire continues to expand in 2018, fans eagerly await any developments in Kylie's pregnancy journey, as her decision to keep this major life event private contrasts with her family's usual transparency.

In Barcelona, Spain, a van deliberately drove into a crowded tourist area, resulting in at least 12 deaths and 80 people being hospitalized. The incident is being treated by the police as a terrorist attack. Celebrities, including Jennifer Lopez, Antonio Banderas, Alyssa Milano, and Ellen DeGeneres, have taken to social media to express their condolences and support for the victims. Various world leaders, such as Donald Trump, Barack Obama, and Cristiano Ronaldo, have also condemned the attack and offered their thoughts and prayers to the people of Barcelona.

Emphasizing their enduring friendship, the couple acknowledged the inclination of the gossip industry to create fictional narratives and wished to convey the truth directly to the public. Ultimately, their priority remains maintaining a deep respect and love for each other, even as they pursue separate paths.

Title: Nicki Minaj Voices Support as Drake Faces Rumors of Fathering Child With Adult Film Star
